definition: this/these/(commonly pr. [zhei4] before a classifier, esp. in Beijing)
down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action

sentences.english: Now you understand the story about Master Monk Xuanzang and why the Dayan Pagoda was built?
sentences.chinese: 这下你了解了玄奘大师的故事和大雁塔的来历了吧？

sentences.english: I sense ticket sales spiking across the country.
sentences.chinese: 我感觉这下全国的彩票销售都要飙升了。

sentences.english: Oh,great,a ball of yarn having an identity crisis.
sentences.chinese: 噢，这下好了，一个毛球有证明身份的危机了。

sentences.english: You can understand why this stock has climbed off its lows.
sentences.chinese: 这下你明白为什么这只股票能够从低谷爬升上来了。

sentences.english: This time, I finally a taste of the "infinite beauty in the Xianfeng" feeling.
sentences.chinese: 这下，我终于领略到了“无限风光在险峰”的感觉。

sentences.english: This should be the end of Drouet, and don't you forget it.
sentences.chinese: 这下杜洛埃就要完蛋了，你别忘了这一点。

sentences.english: Small jalam and da wei mido-suji decorate a room, this jalam can be nasty.
sentences.chinese: 小田为雅兰和达伟布置了一间屋子，这下雅兰可急了。

sentences.english: Then might mess up, first was the daughter goes home "to raise a rumpus ".
sentences.chinese: 这下可乱套了，首先是女儿回家“闹翻了天”。

sentences.english: "It will go now," said Pearl, shaking her head.
sentences.chinese: “这下它要走了，”珠儿摇着头说。

sentences.english: This finally have the solid, w. connor rate return take WangXiaoGong soldiers.
sentences.chinese: 这下终于有了铁证，马戎率兵回城捉拿王小红。

sentences.english: It rained for two weeks, completely ruining our holidays.
sentences.chinese: 雨一连下了两星期，我们的假期这下彻底泡汤了。

definition: in a short while/all at once/all of a sudden
to be finished/to be done for/ruined/gone to the dogs/oh no
hey!/(interjection used to attract attention or to express surprise or disapprobation)
to think to oneself/to think/to assume
unexpectedly/to one's surprise/go so far as to
